items.content_html: "Zod" in the context of TypeScript refers to a powerful and lightweight TypeScript schema validator and builder library. It allows developers to define and validate complex data schemas with ease, ensuring type safety and data integrity in their applications.

It allows developers to define and validate complex data schemas with ease, ensuring type safety and data integrity in their applications.
